remarks: If two translations agree at any atom not under the fiducial co-atom ` W ` , then they are equal.  Lemma D in [Crawley] p. 113.  (Contributed by NM, 2-Jun-2012.)
statement:
cdlemd.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
cdlemd.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
cdlemd.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
cdlemd.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
cdlemd $p |- ( ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ F e. T /\ G e. T ) /\ ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) /\ ( F ` P ) = ( G ` P ) ) -> F = G ) $.
